'''''Hobbit Recipes or Cooking with Hobbits''''' is a cookbook inspired by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Hobbits]].
==From the publisher==
{{blockquote|This fine collection of Hobbit culinary delights has been collected and annotated by that renowned Hobbitish scholar; Gamling Wort. Herein he leads us ‘big folk’ through some wonderful and mouth-watering dishes. Mushrooms and rabbit, naturally, abound ~ enjoy!Book includes; 36 pages, 32 recipes, 35 line illustrations by Cornelius Clifford, colour cover. Size approx: 8.25 by 5.5 inches (210 x 145 mm)}}
